roleset.name: go well with, fill out

example.name: this and that
example.text: The maker of telecommunications and defense equipment said Carol Cable's portfolio and market focus would complement the company's current wire and cable businesses.
example.arg: Carol Cable's portfolio and market focus
the company's current wire and cable businesses

roleset.note: I have a vague intuition that complement might take an agent at somepoint, hence starting arg numbering at 1. And even if no agent everappears, it seems weird to call the first half of a complementary pairthe arg0, since it's not agentive.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'complement' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.
